original_text: I myself am satisfied about you, my brothers, that you yourselves are full of goodness, filled with all knowledge and able to instruct one another.
korean_text: 내 형제들아 너희가 스스로 선함이 가득하고 모든 지식이 차서 능히 서로 권하는 자임을 나도 확신하노라

sentences.original_text: I myself am satisfied about you,
that you yourselves are full of goodness,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 스스로가 선함으로 가득 차 있고,

sentences.original_text: and able to instruct one another.
